item.title: dot.porter on "Anyone interested in teaching a DH workshop for archivists?"
item.dc:creator: dot.porter
item.description: Wish I'd seen this before! I would love to work on something like this. Maybe next year?

item.title: kate.theimer@gmail.com on "Anyone interested in teaching a DH workshop for archivists?"
item.dc:creator: kate.theimer@gmail.com
item.description:
I'd like to see a pre-conference workshop at the next Society of American Archivists meeting (August 2013 in New Orleans) that provides an overview of the kinds of tools and techniques digital humanities scholars may want to use to enhance access to archival materials. Anyone interested in working on a proposal? I'm not married to that approach so if you have other ideas, let me know.

Deadline is October 5, so don't delay.

Kate
@archivesnext on Twitter
